content:
IntervalAutoMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the automatic axis interval mode.

In this Article

public enum IntervalAutoMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
IntervalAutoMode

Fields

FixedCount

A fixed number of intervals are always created on the axis.
VariableCount

The number of axis intervals depends on the axis length.
